titles.title: A bill to prohibit and require notifications with respect to certain investments by United States persons in the People's Republic of China, and for other purposes.
A bill to prohibit and require notifications with respect to certain investments by United States persons in the People's Republic of China, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs.

committee.name: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs
